text: Zisas wo farasegi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgir kov gaar vugap, mbe fugap khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde mbarara, nza ntigem Zerusareman naanga. Nza naanga, mba Fhe Bakɨme kaathoori gumgi, mbe fhum mba Fhe Bakɨme Guma Guaran hɨr za suaŋgi tɨvi, mbe nta khergim, nta Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gavan ki, mba tɨvi ntige guigira mba tegɨrga.
